name: Control of the Soul
description:
Will Chara change their mind?

Control of the Soul, you play as Chara - the version from the Ask Underswap Paps webcomic. It's a visual novel  of the events that happen after they agree to join Sans and Papyrus to their universe. You're just going to guide them along right? After all, they're supposed to be able to make their own choices now.
